newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed, trade back to normal.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed, trade back to normal.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mixed on Wednesday with volume and turnover back to normal after reaching exceptionally high levels the previous day.
* Six of 17 active issues rose, six fell and five were flat.
* Volume halved to 7,791 units, turnover down to 6.5 million kuna.
* Biggest gainer textile firm Varteks added 10 kuna or 14.3 percent to 80 kuna, on volume of 470 units.
* Biggest decliner hotelier Istraturist lost 8 kuna or 4 percent to 185 on volume of 100 shares.
* Most active issue Zagrebacka Banka's ordinary stock lost 21 kuna to 2,000 on volume of 2,063 units.
